Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Entitles every veteran or disabled veteran who has served in more than one time of war additional credit in competitive exams
Summary: Provides that every person who has served in more than one time of war shall be entitled to additional credit as a veteran or disabled veteran in competitive examinations for original appointment or promotion for every such time of war during which such person served, regardless of whether any such person has utilized such credit for a competitive examination for original appointment or a competitive examination for promotion.
LawCode: Amd ยง85, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to the use of credits for veterans and disabled veterans
